scripts.test-rebuild: npx node-gyp rebuild && npm run test
scripts.test-12: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 12 && npm run test-rebuild
scripts.test-14: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 14 && npm run test-rebuild
scripts.test-16: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 16 && npm run test-rebuild
scripts.test-all: npm run test-12 && npm run test-14 && npm run test-16
